content:
@Oliver Bertuch no rush but I'd love to get your opinion of #11318.

After we upgraded Payara in #11128 we started seeing this error:

Error: MailSessionProducerIT$WithSSLWithoutAuthentication.createSession:170 expected: <true> but was: <false>

I don't know if this should be a show stopper for releasing 6.6 or not! :sweat_smile:
Jim seems to be working on a potential fix with #11319. Perhaps src/test/resources/mail/cert.pem doesn't match now that we've upgraded Payara? :thinking:
Seems like a good fix! I approved it. :rocket:

Jim certainly sparked my interest - looking into this at a late Friday evening. I hope he doesn't mind me imposing changes on his branch. https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/11319#issuecomment-2707687819 Turns out it was me doing a rookie mistake that caused the test to fail... :see_no_evil: :rolling_eyes:
Oliver Bertuch has marked this topic as resolved.
